Data Analytics

Data Analytics Expertise

Transforming raw data into actionable business insights through advanced analytics and visualization.

Core Competencies

  • Business Intelligence: Dashboard development and KPI tracking
  • Statistical Analysis: Predictive modeling and trend analysis
  • Data Visualization: Interactive reports using Tableau, Power BI
  • Database Management: SQL optimization and data warehousing

Tools & Technologies

  • Analytics: Python, R, SQL, Excel Advanced
  • Visualization: Tableau, Power BI, matplotlib, seaborn
  • Databases: MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB
  • Cloud Platforms: AWS, Azure Analytics Services

Key Projects

  • Sales performance optimization resulting in 15% revenue increase
  • Customer churn prediction model with 85% accuracy
  • Supply chain analytics reducing costs by $2M annually
  • Real-time operational dashboards for executive reporting
